card1.title: Localized AI Expertise
card1.description: Our platform is tailored for the Uzbek language and regional context, ensuring accuracy and natural data interaction.

card2.title: Seamless Productivity
card2.description: Intelligent agents and integrations help automate daily tasks and speed up workflows.

card3.title: Scalable Solutions
card3.description: From individual users to large companies — we offer solutions that grow with your business.

card4.title: Reliable & Secure
card4.description: User data is protected at all levels, and the platform is built with modern security standards in mind.

footer.aboutText: Building amazing web experiences with modern technologies.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: We are passionate about creating innovative solutions that make a difference.
aboutUs.missionText: Our mission is to deliver cutting-edge technology solutions that empower businesses and individuals to achieve their goals. We strive to create products that are not only functional but also intuitive and enjoyable to use.
aboutUs.visionText: We envision a world where technology seamlessly integrates into everyday life, making processes more efficient and enabling people to focus on what truly matters. Our goal is to be at the forefront of this transformation.
aboutUs.innovationText: We constantly push boundaries and explore new possibilities.
aboutUs.collaborationText: We believe in the power of teamwork and partnership.
aboutUs.excellenceText: We are committed to delivering the highest quality in everything we do.

developers.title: Our Developers
developers.subtitle: Meet the talented team behind our innovative solutions.
developers.aliceBio: Full-stack developer with 10+ years of experience in building scalable web applications.
developers.bobBio: Passionate about creating beautiful and intuitive user interfaces.
developers.carolBio: Specializes in API design and database optimization.
developers.davidBio: Ensures smooth deployments and maintains our infrastructure.
developers.emmaBio: Creates engaging user experiences with a focus on accessibility.
developers.frankBio: Ensures quality through comprehensive testing and automation.
developers.joinTeamText: We're always looking for talented individuals who are passionate about technology and want to make a difference.
